title: ['Natural Disaster Donated Fodder Transport Subsidy']
field_summary: ['This scheme provides funding assistance to organisations that donate and transport donated fodder to a central location within NSW for the benefit of three or more primary producers with livestock, in the event of a declared natural disaster.']

title: ['Living Away From Home Allowance Program']
field_summary: ['Provides assistance to eligible NSW families whose children must board away from home to access secondary education.']

title: ['High emitting industries grants  ']
field_summary: ['Funding is available to help high-emitting manufacturing and mining facilities in NSW develop and deploy decarbonisation projects, from feasibility studies through to commissioning.']

title: ['Drought Ready and Resilient Fund']
field_summary: ['Low interest loans of up to $250,000 are available to primary producers in NSW to fund a broad range of products, activities and services aimed at improving drought preparedness and climate variability resilience.']

title: ['NSW East Coast Severe Weather grants']
field_summary: ['Grant and financial support for individuals, businesses and primary producers, non-profits and non-government organisations impacted by the NSW East Coast Severe Weather from 18 May 2025 (AGRN 1212).']
grant_amount_text: ['Amount dependent on type of grant being applied for.']

title: ['Motor vehicle duty relief']
field_summary: ['If your motor vehicle was destroyed in a declared natural disaster, the NSW government may be able to refund any motor vehicle duty you pay on a replacement vehicle.']

title: ['Energy Accounts Payment Assistance scheme']
field_summary: ["If you're having difficulty paying your current household energy bill because of a short-term financial crisis or emergency, such as unexpected medical bills, or reduced income due to COVID-19, you could be eligible for EAPA $50 vouchers."]

title: [' Off-farm Efficiency Program ']
field_summary: ['The program provides funding to upgrade water infrastructure to reduce water losses and return water to the environment.']

field_summary: ['Get up to $1,000 towards the cost of workplace health and safety items.']

title: ['Natural Disaster Relief Loan - Primary Producers']
field_summary: ['Primary producers directly affected by a declared natural disaster may be eligible for a low interest loan of up to $130,000 to support recovery.']

title: ['Research Grants']
field_summary: ['Funding for a range of research projects to build the evidence base for responsible gambling policy, interventions and programs.']

title: ['Boarding Scholarships for Isolated Students ']

field_summary: ['Small business operators directly affected by a declared natural disaster may be eligible for a low interest loan of up to $130,000 to support recovery.']

field_summary: ['These rebates help reduce good quality food from being sent to landfill in NSW by supporting not-for-profit organisations to purchase eligible items that safely manage increased amounts of rescued food.']

title: ['Disaster Relief Grants']
field_summary: ['These grants support those most in need and those least able to return their homes to a safe and habitable condition after a natural disaster such as low-income earners and where the damage is not covered by insurance.']

title: ['Natural Disaster Relief Loan - Sporting and Recreation Clubs and Associations']
field_summary: ['Sporting and recreation clubs and associations directly affected by a declared natural disaster may be eligible for a low interest loan of up to $10,000 to support recovery.']

title: ['First Home Buyer Assistance scheme']
field_summary: ['If you’re a first home buyer you may be entitled to a concessional rate of transfer duty or even an exemption from paying it altogether. This applies to buying an existing home, a new home or vacant land on which you intend to build a home.']
grant_amount_text: ['Amount based on the home or land value']

title: ['Local Government Road Safety Program']
field_summary: ['This program provides up to 50% funding contribution to the salary of a Road Safety Officer and funding for local road safety projects.']

title: ['M5 South-West Cashback Scheme']
field_summary: ['This scheme allows NSW residents to claim back the value of tolls (excluding GST) paid while using a vehicle registered in NSW for private, pensioner or charitable use on the M5 South-West Motorway.']

title: ['Emergency relief for regional town water supplies program']
field_summary: ['The program provides grants to local water utilities towards the cost of water carting or water supply works during periods of emergency.']

title: ['Natural Disaster Transport Subsidy']
field_summary: ['The subsidy is available to eligible primary producers for the transport of fodder and/or water to a property, stock to/from agistment, stock to sale or slaughter, or bee or oyster movements following a declared natural disaster.']

title: ['Marine Estate Management Strategy Reconnecting Fish Habitats']
field_summary: ['This program provides funding from the NSW Marine Estate Management Strategy to projects that improve habitat connectivity for fish in coastal waterways of NSW.']

title: ['First Home Owner (New Homes) Grant']
field_summary: ['This grant is available\xa0when you buy or build your first new home. Your first new home can be a house, townhouse, apartment, unit or similar that is newly built, purchased off the plan or substantially renovated.']

title: ['Seniors Energy Rebate']
field_summary: ['The NSW Seniors Energy Rebate is available for eligible independent self-funded retirees to help cover the cost of their electricity. Gas accounts are not included.']

title: ['Toll Relief - rebate']
